name: Tembung Loro
description:
This game is Fighting-Action Game (not sure for Genre) about using the People Comment in Indonesian Language as A WEAPON.
So Just throw it to your enemy and reduce health point to 0 for WIN

(You can also can test it at browser)

Control : Use Your keyboard (sorry, not tested for other controller),
You Can edit it before you play (tested 21-03, 17.00 )

Creator of Content :
